Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 163rd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/2015, off Ruben Figueredo (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off Bill Michelson (BRO)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/14/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 4/23/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2017, hitting .375 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Colorado on 9/18/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2018, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/26/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $9,800,000 per year...
Injured on 4/5/2019 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/29/2019 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis (C), driving in 4 runs on 7/25/2020...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2021, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 7/17/2021 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2022, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/14/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 5/27/2024.
